numDimensions.markdownDescription: Number of vector dimensions. Values may range from 1 to 2048.
numDimensions.description: Number of vector dimensions. Values may range from 1 to 2048.

similarity.markdownDescription:
Vector similarity function to use to search for top K-nearest neighbors. 
Values include:
- `euclidean` - measures the distance between ends of vectors allowing similarity measurements based on varying dimensions. See [Euclidean](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Euclidean_distance) to learn more.
- `cosine` - measures similarity based on the angle between vectors allowing for similarity measurements not scaled by magnitude. See [Cosine](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cosine_similarity) to learn more.
- `dotProduct` - measures similarity based on both the angle between, and magnitude of vectors. See [Dot Product](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dot_product) to learn more.
similarity.description: Vector similarity function to use to search for top K-nearest neighbors
